newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Bank of China Hong Kong raises prime rate 25 bp.
newsitem.headline: Bank of China Hong Kong raises prime rate 25 bp.

text.p: Bank of China Hong Kong branch said on Wednesday it would raise its prime rate by 25 basis points to 8.75 percent with effect from Thursday.

The move follows the Hong Kong Association of Banks' decision to raise short-term deposit rates by 25 basis points on Wednesday following Tuesday's 25 basis point increase in the U.S. federal funds rates.
Several Hong Kong commercial banks also raised their prime rates by 25 basis points.
